user_query: I want to find the address for the geocoordinates '35.664159,139.718117', suggest the five largest cities within a 50-kilometer radius, and recommend a map tile of the area with English labels.

TaskList.description: Retrieve the address based on the provided geocoordinates '35.664159,139.718117'.
Find the five largest cities within a 50-kilometer radius of the given location.
Generate a map tile for the area with English labels.
